description: Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=requestHandler handlerType=adaptor.

adaptorId.brief: If specified, this adaptorId is prepended to the path
adaptorId.description: If this property is specified, a '/' followed by adaptorId is prepended to the path passed to process request if it does not already have that prefix.
adaptorId.label: Adaptor

objectType.brief: If specified, this objectType is prepended to the path
objectType.description: If this property is specified, a '/' followed by adaptorId followed by a '/' followed by objectType is prepended to the path passed to process request if it does not already have that prefix. If this property is specified, adaptorId is required.
objectType.label: Object Type

defaultOptions.brief: Default object options for method GET requests through this request handler
defaultOptions.description: This is the default object options for method GET requests though this request handler.
defaultOptions.label: Default Options
